TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeySpline extends System.Windows.Freezable implements class System.IFormattable
Public Class KeySpline Inherits Freezable Implements IFormattable
public ref class KeySpline : System::Windows::Freezable, IFormattable
type KeySpline = class inherit Freezable interface IFormattable

summary.span: 样条关键帧使用此类定义动画进度。

span.span: This class is used by a spline key frame to define animation progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何 工作，了解三次方贝塞尔曲线会很有帮助。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 中的两个坐标 定义了这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述关键样条时，贝塞尔曲线的起点始终为0，终点始终为1，这就是为何仅定义两个控制点的原因。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定动画在时间段内插值的方式;也就是说，曲线表示在某个时间段内动画目标属性的变化速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅 [主曲线动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *cp1X**cp1X* 曲线的第一个控制点的分量。 component of the curve's first control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. *cp1Y**cp1Y* 曲线的第一个控制点的分量。 component of the curve's first control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. *cp2X**cp2X* 曲线的第二个控制点的分量。 component of the curve's second control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. *cp2Y**cp2Y* 曲线的第二个控制点的分量。 component of the curve's second control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. 值之间的分隔符可以是逗号或一个或多个空格。The separator between values may be either comma or one or more spaces. 此处所示的点和空间之间的逗号之间的约定是推荐的约定。The convention shown here of commas between components of a point and space between points is a recommended convention. 不要在点组件的值中使用逗号作为小数点，即使这是你的区域性中的标准。Do not use a comma as the decimal point within the values of point components, even if that is the norm in your culture. 在所有类型转换情况下，XAML 值都被视为 en-us，因此逗号被解释为分隔符，而不是预期的小数点。XAML values are treated as en-us in all type conversion cases, and the comma is thus interpreted as the separator and not as the intended decimal point.

span.span: Key Spline Animation Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和的默认值 分别 (0、0) 和 (1，1) ，这对动画或关键帧的进度没有影响。The default values for and are (0,0) and (1,1) respectively, which has no effect on the progress of an animation or key frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由方法调用， 不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用， 而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何 工作，了解三次方贝塞尔曲线会很有帮助。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 中的两个坐标 定义了这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述关键样条时，贝塞尔曲线的起点始终为0，终点始终为1，这就是为何仅定义两个控制点的原因。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定动画在时间段内插值的方式;也就是说，曲线表示在某个时间段内动画目标属性的变化速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅 [主曲线动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何 工作，了解三次方贝塞尔曲线会很有帮助。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 中的两个坐标 定义了这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述关键样条时，贝塞尔曲线的起点始终为0，终点始终为1，这就是为何仅定义两个控制点的原因。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定动画在时间段内插值的方式;也就是说，曲线表示在某个时间段内动画目标属性的变化速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅 [主曲线动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定， 则在尝试冻结对象并引发时会失败 。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 此方法由方法调用， 不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结副本，请调用， 而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何 工作，了解三次方贝塞尔曲线会很有帮助。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 中的两个坐标 定义了这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述关键样条时，贝塞尔曲线的起点始终为0，终点始终为1，这就是为何仅定义两个控制点的原因。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定动画在时间段内插值的方式;也就是说，曲线表示在某个时间段内动画目标属性的变化速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅 [主曲线动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
